Episodes.Title: It's Alive!
Episodes.Plot: Things are really beginning to heat up for Dexter: Doakes' suspicions about him are growing, his victims are escaping, and his body dump site has been found. Meanwhile Paul is troubling Rita over the missing shoe and Debra is going through trauma over the Ice Truck killer incident.
Episodes.GuestStars: Anna Maganini, Claude Shires, Ron Rogg√©, Craig Patton, Judith Scott, Mark Pellegrino, Glenn Plummer, Devon Graye, Max Gail, Matthew J. Willig, Jillian Bruno

Episodes.Title: Waiting to Exhale
Episodes.Plot: Dexter is finding it hard to have closure on killing his brother. There is a new FBI agent to head the "Bay Harbor Butcher" case. Debra is finding it tough to put the past behind her.
Episodes.GuestStars: Kevin Buitrago, Jillian Bruno, Marco De Luca, Judith Scott, Matthew J. Willig, Maxwell Huckabee, Brandon Killham, George Tovar, Julia Vera, Anna Maganini, Dave Baez, Martin A. Papazian

Episodes.Title: An Inconvenient Lie
Episodes.Plot: Dexter sets his sights on a new victim: a murderer so repulsive it seems only fitting that he's a used-car salesman. Dexter's been unable to lie to Rita about his midnight activities, which has her thinking that he's a drug addict. She's threatened to leave him if he doesn't commit to a 12-step program to deal with his supposed addiction. While in this recovery, though, Dexter meets a sexy, mysterious woman named Lila.
Episodes.GuestStars: Judith Scott, Don McManus, Kristen Kerr

Episodes.Title: See-Through
Episodes.Plot: Rita's estranged mother visits and senses something is wrong with Dexter. Masuka thinks he's developed a lead in the Bay Harbor Butcher case, which has Dexter concerned. Angel's interrogation of a witness crosses a line.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: R16 Violence,offensive language and sex scenes
Episodes.GuestStars: Dave Baez, JoBeth Williams, Judith Scott, Kiko Ellsworth

Episodes.Title: The Dark Defender
Episodes.Plot: Dexter finds out that the man who killed his mother, right in front of him, is still alive. When he tells this to Lila, she suggests he face the man, as part of his road to addiction recovery. But then as his sponsor she insists on tagging along.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: R16 Violence,offensive language and sex scenes
Episodes.GuestStars: Sage Kirkpatrick, Tony Amendola, Jaime Murray, Keith Carradine, JoBeth Williams

Episodes.Title: Dex, Lies, and Videotape
Episodes.Plot: A copy-cat killer follows the lead of the "Bay Harbor Butcher." Dexter must destroy an incriminating surveillance video.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: R16 Violence,offensive language and sex scenes
Episodes.GuestStars: Jaime Murray, Keith Carradine, Dave Baez, Silas Weir Mitchell, John Ciccolini, Salvator Xuereb, JoBeth Williams

Episodes.Title: That Night, A Forest Grew
Episodes.Plot: Dexter manages to get Doakes off his back. He devises a plan to get the police in another direction. Lila and Dex's relationship intensifies, and he has some interaction with Rita and the kids.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: R16 Violence,offensive language and sex scenes
Episodes.GuestStars: Jaime Murray, JoBeth Williams, Keith Carradine, Dave Baez

Episodes.Title: Morning Comes
Episodes.Plot: Dexter is attacked by the man who murdered his mother. Meanwhile, Lila wants to get closer to Dex, and Debra and Lundy close in on the Bay Harbor Butcher.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: R16 Violence,offensive language and sex scenes
Episodes.GuestStars: Jaime Murray, Tony Amendola, Keith Carradine

Episodes.Title: Resistance Is Futile
Episodes.Plot: Dexter realizes it won't be easy to end things completely with Lila. Dexter tries to stay ahead of the investigations as the manhunt for the Bay Harbor Butcher intensifies. An enemy of Dexter figures out his secret.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: R16 Violence,offensive language and sex scenes
Episodes.GuestStars: Brian Scolaro, Eli Goodman, Adam Lieberman

Episodes.Title: There's Something About Harry
Episodes.Plot: Doakes follows Dexter to his next crime scene and shocks him with a revelation about Harry. The Bay Harbor Butcher task force feels they are zeroing in on their man.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: R16 Violence,offensive language and sex scenes

Episodes.Title: Left Turn Ahead
Episodes.Plot: Dexter must make a massive decision that will have an effect on all those he holds close. Lila meanwhile is back with a secret to blackmail Dexter.
Episodes.GuestStars: Jonathan Banks, Mary Ostrow, Wilmer Calderon, Peter Macon, Cedric Duplechain, Alistair Tober, Gilbert Saldivar, Tony Colitti

Episodes.Title: The British Invasion
Episodes.Plot: The Task force believes the Bay Harbor Butcher case is closed, but Dexter still has some trouble to deal with.
Episodes.GuestStars: Jonathan Banks, Eli Goodman, Stephanie Y. Wang, Gary Kraus, Troy Metcalf, Mary Alyce Kania, Darryl Sivad, Troy Metcalf, Manny Suarez, L.T. Tolliver, Maxwell Huckabee
